reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-fitting, with one mentioning it works well with 2-inch heels.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautful
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. Fits like a dream. Very high quality fabric. It is quality made. I am a seamstress myself, and very happy with the quality of all. It was perfect for a winter holiday party. I purchased the green. It is form fitting. I did size up one. I typically wear an 8 but I sized up to a 10 and it was perfect. I am 5'6'' 142 pounds. It was very comfortable. I it has a little bit of a stretch to the fabric. It is forgiving fabric so I was fortunate enough not to have to wear spanx!! Made for a much, more comfortable evening. It has a built in cup area so no strapless bra was needed. I am a 'C' cup. Could have one if desired but not really needed for coverage anyway. - Love, Love it! Read more
items.author: SCD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Simple Elegance
items.body: Affordable simple elegance is how I would describe this dress. The dress fit perfectly once I found my size. I actually ended up with a smaller size than I thought. The velvet is not only soft to the touch but has enough weight to drape nicely without being heavy. It is a very comfortable dress. It has a built in shelf bra that I needed tighten the elastic a bit. It did have very light bra liner that I easily removed because I didnâ€™t like the placement but I am small busted so probably not an issue for most. I will wear a strapless bra. Other than that, I didnâ€™t have to change a thing, dress or sleeve length - etcâ€¦ Very happy with my purchase and look forward to wearing. Read more
items.author: Susan Mikluscak

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice giwn
items.body: Great fit, soft and comfortable Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: Gorgeous. Got alot of compliments. Great fit. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality
items.body: Love this dress! Excellent quality for a great price. Itâ€™s comfortable and very flattering. I bought a second dress from them I loved it so much! Read more
items.author: Sam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and well made
items.body: Very flattering and well made. Super elegant. Wearing as mother of the groom winter wedding! Read more
items.author: Stephanie Branch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS DRESS
items.body: I have a very hard time finding dresses on Amazon that are petite length AND are a number size (NOT S,M,L). This is one of the few! The length is PERFECT. I am almost 5â€™3, bra size is a big B/small C & I weigh 115. I also hate being cold so this dress really works! If you are petite (short ðŸ¤£) buy this dress! I would have given it 5 stars but the stitching on the right sleeve is coming off. I would return for an even exchange but I need it ASAP. Will have my tailor repair it. Read more
items.author: rachel militello

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter, Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
